# The `CombineResult` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper structure that holds all the necessary information to materialize a combine that does some extension folding. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Helper structure that holds all the necessary information to materialize a combine that does some extension folding.

Definition at line 15534 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvisellowering-cpp">RISCVISelLowering.cpp</a>.

Return a value that uses TargetOpcode and that can be used to replace Root.

The actual replacement is <em>not</em> done in that method.
